ai.title: feat: Significant enhancement to code description generation
ai.body:
This PR introduces a major update to the code description generation capabilities.  The changes include:

* Substantial improvements to the core code analysis engine resulting in more accurate and comprehensive descriptions.
* Addition of several new features and functionalities, significantly expanding the system's capabilities.
*  Updated documentation for both users (CODESCRIBE_COMMAND_REFERENCE.md) and plugin developers (docs/PLUGIN_DEVELOPMENT.md).
* Enhancements to the `linear_agent.js` module.
* Refinements to the context analysis (`src/context/ContextAnalyzer.js`).

The changes are extensive, affecting many aspects of the system.  Detailed changes are reflected in the numerous newly added `.codescribe/history/*.json` files. These files track the evolution of the code description generation process over multiple iterations.  The `codescribe.log` file provides an overall log of this extensive process.

This update represents a significant step forward in the accuracy, comprehensiveness, and utility of code descriptions generated by the system.
ai.summary: Major update to code description generation, adding significant new features and improving accuracy.


pr.title: feat: Significant enhancement to code description generation
pr.body:
This PR introduces a major update to the code description generation capabilities.  The changes include:

* Substantial improvements to the core code analysis engine resulting in more accurate and comprehensive descriptions.
* Addition of several new features and functionalities, significantly expanding the system's capabilities.
*  Updated documentation for both users (CODESCRIBE_COMMAND_REFERENCE.md) and plugin developers (docs/PLUGIN_DEVELOPMENT.md).
* Enhancements to the `linear_agent.js` module.
* Refinements to the context analysis (`src/context/ContextAnalyzer.js`).

The changes are extensive, affecting many aspects of the system.  Detailed changes are reflected in the numerous newly added `.codescribe/history/*.json` files. These files track the evolution of the code description generation process over multiple iterations.  The `codescribe.log` file provides an overall log of this extensive process.

This update represents a significant step forward in the accuracy, comprehensiveness, and utility of code descriptions generated by the system.

Multiple files changed. Consider reviewing architecture diagrams for impact assessment.
API interactions detected. Review sequence diagrams for proper error handling.

pr.title: feat: Significant enhancement to code description generation
pr.body:
This PR introduces a major update to the code description generation capabilities.  The changes include:

* Substantial improvements to the core code analysis engine resulting in more accurate and comprehensive descriptions.
* Addition of several new features and functionalities, significantly expanding the system's capabilities.
*  Updated documentation for both users (CODESCRIBE_COMMAND_REFERENCE.md) and plugin developers (docs/PLUGIN_DEVELOPMENT.md).
* Enhancements to the `linear_agent.js` module.
* Refinements to the context analysis (`src/context/ContextAnalyzer.js`).

The changes are extensive, affecting many aspects of the system.  Detailed changes are reflected in the numerous newly added `.codescribe/history/*.json` files. These files track the evolution of the code description generation process over multiple iterations.  The `codescribe.log` file provides an overall log of this extensive process.

This update represents a significant step forward in the accuracy, comprehensiveness, and utility of code descriptions generated by the system.
